title: NBC Enters the Streaming Wars and September Television Stays Winning | The Watch
description:
NBC launched its streaming service Peacock this week, and its backlog of shows like ‘The Office’ and ‘30 Rock’ make it an instant contender (1:00). September continues to be a very good month for television, with shows like ‘Top Boy’ (7:30) and Ken Burns’s newest documentary ‘Country Music’ (27:37). Plus, we have to talk about this week’s episode of ‘Righteous Gemstones’ (43:09).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Donnie Kwak and Jason Gallagher

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
